creditline: Gift of Gerald Ray Nelson and Joanne Hogan Nelson
description: central sketch of a standing man wearing glasses, visor and vest, carrying a very large book; three small head studies at right, one at left
medium: Graphite and pastel (?) on brown paper
provenance: The artist; his stepdaughter, Joanie Nelson, Vancouver, WA
title: Untitled [study of a man with a large book and head studies]
